verses.name: Psalms 64:1
verses.text: Hear my voice, O God, in my prayer: preserve my life from fear of the enemy.

verses.name: Psalms 64:2
verses.text: Hide me from the secret counsel of the wicked; from the insurrection of the workers of iniquity:

verses.name: Psalms 64:3
verses.text: Who whet their tongue like a sword, and bend their bows to shoot their arrows, even bitter words:

verses.name: Psalms 64:4
verses.text: That they may shoot in secret at the perfect: suddenly do they shoot at him, and fear not.

verses.name: Psalms 64:5
verses.text: They encourage themselves in an evil matter: they commune of laying snares privily; they say, Who shall see them?

verses.name: Psalms 64:6
verses.text: They search out iniquities; they accomplish a diligent search: both the inward thought of every one of them, and the heart, is deep.

verses.name: Psalms 64:7
verses.text: But God shall shoot at them with an arrow; suddenly shall they be wounded.

verses.name: Psalms 64:8
verses.text: So they shall make their own tongue to fall upon themselves: all that see them shall flee away.

verses.name: Psalms 64:9
verses.text: And all men shall fear, and shall declare the work of God; for they shall wisely consider of his doing.

verses.name: Psalms 64:10
verses.text: The righteous shall be glad in the Lord, and shall trust in him; and all the upright in heart shall glory.
